alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:58PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Umatilla County through 430 PM PDT... At 357 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northern Umatilla Reservation, or 12 miles northwest of Meacham, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Adams, Thorn Hollow, Cayuse, Gibbon and northern Umatilla Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
